class_notes: This class meets the 2nd 7 weeks of the semester only.
course_description: Through practical applications, including in-class exercises, homework exercises, and a final research project, students will become familiar with the principles, strategies, and best practices for doing statutory research. Topics for class sessions will include research strategy and documentation, advanced search techniques, codes, session laws, and legislative history. The course will focus primarily on federal statutory research but will include one class session devoted to state statutory research.
